name: Winter Dye
flavorText: Jars of crushed Veilwood petals are buried in the snow throughout the winter to create this soft white hue.
flavorTextHtml: Jars of crushed Veilwood petals are buried in the snow throughout the winter to create this soft white hue.
description: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
descriptionHtml: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
